channel.title: Blend - Single Page Template
channel.description:
Here's a one page template that I made earlier today.
Direct image link: http://i.gyazo.com/ce386b5e2bfe670fe262ce0788e078d5.png [spoiler=Warning - Larger Image][img]http://i.gyazo.com/ce386b5e2bfe670fe262ce0788e078d5.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: Blend - Single Page Template
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

RuneData:

Shiity template if you ask me. Use bootstrap and design that template Would be something cool to see…

Elaborate on what you mean by use bootstrap? E.g what elements of bootstrap would further this? There are better frameworks out there to be used IMO. I’d rather someone done something from scratch than used a framework, that’s a lot cooler.

Read full topic

item.title: Blend - Single Page Template
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

HcoJustin:

Neat concept but how well does it scale on smaller screens

It’s not responsive.

Ruby:

Code

I cheated a bit. 



    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
        <head>
            <title>
                Something Template
            </title>
            <link href="css/style.css" rel="stylesheet"></link>
            <link href="http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans" rel="stylesheet"></link>
            <link href="css/fontawesome/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet"></link>
            <script>
                document.onkeydown = function(e) {
                                var k = e.keyCode;
                                if(k >= 37 && k <= 40) {
                                    return false;
                                }
                            }
            </script>
        </head>
        <body>
            <div id="left">
                <header>
                    <i class="fa fa-twitter-square"></i>
                    <i class="fa fa-facebook-square"></i>
                    <i class="fa fa-google-plus-square"></i>
                    <i class="fa fa-github-square"></i>
                </header>
                <h1>
                    Some awesome title here
                </h1>
                <h2>
                    Some smaller less awesome title here
                </h2>
                <h3>
                    Some smaller, more boring title here
                </h3>
                <div id="logo">
                    <img alt="logo" src="http://placehold.it/320x120&text=image goes here"></img>
                </div>
                <footer>
                    <p>
                        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicin…
                    </p>
                    <div id="copy">
                                            © 2014 John                                      
                    </div>
                </footer>
            </div>
            <div id="right">
                <div id="yellow" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        Back To Home
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-home"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="orange" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        Who We Are
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-group"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="red" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        What We Do
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-pencil-square"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="violet" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        What We Offer
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-gear"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="indigo" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        Visit The Store
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-suitcase"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="blue" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        Testimonials
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-comments"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="green" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        Frequently Asked Questions
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-question-circle"></i>
                </div>
                <div id="green2" class="block">
                    <a href="#">
                        Blog
                    </a>
                    <i class="fa fa-keyboard-o"></i>
                </div>
            </div>
        </body>
    </html>
body {
   font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
   margin: 0;
   overflow: hidden;
}
#left {
   float: left;
   position: absolute;
   width: 750px;
   height: 120vh;
   background: white;
   border-radius: 0px 600px 600px 0;
   margin: -170px 0 0 0;
   padding: 180px 0 0 0;
}
header {
   font-size: 20px;
   margin: 0 0 0 30px;
}
header i {
   margin: 0 5px;
}
#left h1 {
   margin: 150px 0 0 30px;
   font-size: 48px;
   font-weight: 900;
}
#left h2 {
   font-size: 30px;
   font-weight: 900;
   width: 650px;
   margin: 20px 0 0 30px;
}
#left h3 {
   font-size: 20px;
   font-weight: 900;
   width: 650px;
   margin: 20px 0 0 30px;
}
#left #logo {
   width: 320px;
   height: 120px;
   margin: 100px 0 0 30px;
}
footer {
   width: 600px;
   height: 300px;
   margin: 0 0 0 30px;
}
footer p {
   font-size: 14px;
   text-align: justify;
}
footer #copy {
   font-size: 12px;
   margin: 45px 0;
}
#right {
   background: yellow;
   height: 100vh;
}
#right .block {
   width: 100%;
   height: 4.58vh;
   text-align: right;
   color: #FFF;
   padding: 31.7px 0;
}
#right .block i {
   font-size: 30px;
   padding: 0 20px 0 10px;
   line-height: 100%;
}
#right .block a {
   color: #FFF;
   text-decoration: none;
}
#red {
   background: #D03A43;
}
#orange {
   background: #DD8337;
}
#yellow {
   background: #ECB946;
}
#green {
   background: #459B76;
}
#blue {
   background: #3868A6;
}
#indigo {
   background: #704688;
}
#violet {
   background: #A6315D;
}
#green2 {
   background: #88B25C;
}

Read full topic
